mapper.select: SELECT b.id,a.status,a.order_on,a.actual_price,a.goods_price,b.order_id, d.link_man,d.mobile,c.name,c.min_price,c.pic,b.number,b.specification,a.remark,a.create_time, d.address, d.province_str,d.city_str,d.district_str,d.code,a.pay_id,b.logistics_order_on,b.logistics_company FROM order_user a LEFT JOIN order_goods b ON a.id = b.order_id LEFT JOIN shop c ON b.goods_id = c.id LEFT JOIN address d ON a.address_id = d.id ORDER BY a.create_time DESC

SELECT b.id,a.status,a.order_on,a.actual_price,a.goods_price,b.order_id, d.link_man,d.mobile,c.name,c.min_price,c.pic,b.number,b.specification,a.remark,a.create_time, d.address, d.province_str,d.city_str,d.district_str,d.code,a.pay_id,b.logistics_order_on,b.logistics_company FROM order_user a LEFT JOIN order_goods b ON a.id = b.order_id LEFT JOIN shop c ON b.goods_id = c.id LEFT JOIN address d ON a.address_id = d.id WHERE 1=1
AND a.order_on LIKE '%${searchName}%'
OR d.link_man LIKE '%${searchName}%'
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
